section.title: Installation - Zip Archive Method
section.p:
To install the plugin using the Zip Archive method, follow this procedure:
Download the Oxygen AI Positron for Eclipse archive.
Extract the archive's contents into the dropins folder located within your Eclipse installation directory.
Restart Eclipse.
Result: The AI Positron side view is now available. If the view is not displayed, it can be opened by selecting it from Window Show View .

section.title: Installation - Update Site Method
section.p:
To install the plugin using the Update Site method, follow this procedure:
Start Eclipse.
Go to Help Install New Software .
Click Add in the resulting dialog box.
In the Location field, enter https://www.oxygenxml.com/InstData/AI-Positron/Eclipse/site.xml. The Name field accepts any value. Click Add when finished.
Select the checkbox next to the Oxygen AI Positron plugin and click Next.
Select the Oxygen AI Positron plugin and click Finish.
Restart Eclipse when prompted.
Result: The AI Positron side view is now available. If the view is not displayed, it can be opened by selecting it from Window Show View .

section.title: Licensing and Configuration
section.p: You can configure the company-specific AI service details in the AI Service Configuration Preferences Page.
The AI Positron plugin works free of charge with any Oxygen installation using an Enterprise license type for Oxygen.

If your license of Oxygen is not an Enterprise license, a special license key needs to be purchased for the plugin to enable this direct access. You can use the Register button in the AI Positron side view to configure the special license key.
